review: I really have not had time to play around with this much yet.
author: tinmarcoo

review: I LOVE IT!  It is a little tedious sometimes but once you get the hang of it you will be just fine.  BUY cause I WOULD BUY IT AGAIN AND AS GIFTS!
author: SEAN

review: Have had the Fire Stick for about a week and so far I just love it!  Very easy to use and lots of things to watch!  Combined with Amazon Prime it was a great investment!
author: Robert Reid

review: An amazing product.  Easy to use.  Quick setup.  Highly superior to the chromecast. I already ordered a second one.
author: ginger

review: Very easy to install!  Meets all expectations!
author: JoAnn Williams

review: Love this! So much better than a Google chromecast!
author: Tara Tomlinson

review: Good product runs slick and fast.  My only complaint is the menu is a little busy.  Rather than just show all the apps on the front screen it shows apps and recent shows you have watched and always pushes amazon content to the front.
author: Jim p.
